room_title: Escape room "Spellbound" by RISE Escape Rooms in Tickfaw
review: Spellbound is the rare game that knocks puzzles, set, and story out of the ballpark, creating a one of a kind experience for experienced escapees. The set, as seen in the photos, is a highly detailed, ominous landscape filled with symbols, bottles, and mysterious tools that will all be used to aid in your escape. The puzzles are quite difficult and satisfying, being a great mixture of pure challenge and immersive interaction, an excellent mix. The storyline is quite engaging and complex, unique in the escape room world, and a refreshing addition after the tireless tropes many experienced players are tired of. Do not play this game if you are not experienced, however, as it is very difficult and will likely not be very fun. For the more experienced players, however, this is one of the best choices in the current market.

room_title: Escape room "Spellbound" by RISE Escape Rooms in Tickfaw
review: Me and my friends are escape room junkies and decided to give the Spellbound room a try. Some of the puzzles were a little finicky, but they were also complex and fun. This particular room was extremely well put together and exceeded our expectations. I'd recommend this to anybody.

room_title: Escape room "Spellbound" by RISE Escape Rooms in Tickfaw
review: There is an amazing experience awaiting you in Tickfaw Louisiana!! Some of the nations best escape room games await you! We played Spellbound and Hijacked; both knocked it outta the park. The set design makes the experience beyond immersive. The puzzles are challenging but doable.You must experience these escape games for yourself.

room_title: Escape room "Spellbound" by RISE Escape Rooms in Tickfaw
review: Amazing! Spellbound was easily the best game I've ever played. The theming and immersion were top notch with an amazing amount of tech. Mindi is an awesome GM and owner. We can't wait to see what future games they have to offer! Definitely worth the drive from Lafayette!

room_title: Escape room "Spellbound" by RISE Escape Rooms in Tickfaw
review: Came from out of town with two groups of ladies. We did all three rooms and escaped from all of them! We had a blast. We have done 30+ rooms in south Louisiana and Spellbound is definitely one of my favorite rooms! Staff was awesome!
